text: On 25 May 2022, jihadist insurgents attacked Madjoari in the Kompienga Province of Burkina Faso. The massacre left at least 50 civilians dead as they were trying to escape. It was the third attack to take place in Madjoari in May 2022, after an attack on 14 May that killed 17 civilians and another on 19 May that killed 11 soldiers. It is also the deadliest attack in Burkina Faso since the Solhan massacre, which officially killed 132 people. ==Related pages== *List of ongoing armed conflicts ==References== Category:2022 crimes in Africa Category:2022 disasters in Africa Category:2020s murders in Africa Category:2020s in Burkina Faso Category:Mass murder in 2022 Category:Massacres in Africa Category:May 2022 events
